EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Paul, Just left you a message. Please use the link below to enroll and give me a ring when you can be in front of a computer to review the net cash estimate. Thank you, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> sconde@mbopartners.com [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] Sent: Thursday, March 29, 2012 5:04 PM To: leblancc4i@att.net Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear Paul, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking here <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A4A53B54BBA223F28F80>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns.
We look forward to working with you. Regards, Sara CondeEnrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6028 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com%20> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
